_A_TEXT_STYLES_FONT_SIZE_DESCRIPTION_: CSS classes for controlling font size. Use classes from .a_fs_1 to .a_fs_7 to set various text sizes in your application.
_A_TEXT_STYLES_ALIGNMENT_DESCRIPTION_: CSS classes for controlling text alignment. Basic classes (.a_text_left, .a_text_right, .a_text_center, .a_text_justify) and their responsive variants for different screen sizes (_mobile, _tablet, _touch, _desktop, _widescreen, _fullhd, _large).
_A_TEXT_STYLES_TRANSFORMATION_DESCRIPTIO: CSS classes for changing text case and formatting. Use .a_text_lowercase for lowercase, .a_text_uppercase for uppercase, .a_text_capitalize for capitalizing the first letter of each word, as well as classes for underlining and striking through text.
_A_TEXT_STYLES_FONT_WEIGHT_DESCRIPTION_: CSS classes for controlling font weight and style. Includes options from light (.a_text_light) to bold (.a_text_bold, .a_text_bolder), as well as italic (.a_text_italic) and normal style (.a_text_normal).
_A_TEXT_STYLES_WRAP_DESCRIPTION_: CSS classes for controlling text wrapping. Includes normal wrapping (.a_text_wrap), no wrapping (.a_text_nowrap), forced wrapping of long words (.a_text_break), hyphenated wrapping (.a_text_wrap_hyphens), and truncation with ellipsis (.a_text_truncate).
_A_TEXT_STYLES_CLAMP_DESCRIPTION_: CSS classes for limiting the number of displayed text lines with an ellipsis at the end. The base class .a_text_clamp limits text to one line, while modifiers .a_text_clamp_2 - .a_text_clamp_5 allow displaying the corresponding number of lines.
